name: OCCUPIED (itch)
description:
This is my actual bathroom, I have to go through this every day.

a funi little game made in two weeks during the GDKO Gamejam

CONTROLS > Left Click to interact > Mouse to look around > P to pause > Scroll to change held item Credits
Bathroom -> My Bathrrom
Water Goblin -> Brother
Freesounds -> sounds
Protagonist -> @OscailDev (twitterdotcom)
Columbo -> Peter K
Waterbottle enjoyer -> Melo (Running Shine)
Protagonist -> Richard Harrison

Play in the browser or download the windows version.
